body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install valgrind %gcc@8.3.1 ~boost~mpi
...
  >> 876    /usr/bin/ld: cannot find -lubsan
  >> 877    collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status
...
```

### Information on your system

```
$ spack debug report
* **Spack:** 0.15.3
* **Python:** 3.6.8
* **Platform:** linux-rhel8-haswell
```

### Additional information

* [spack-build-env.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/5114159/spack-build-env.txt)
* [spack-build-out.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/5114160/spack-build-out.txt)

### General information

- [x] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [x] I have run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and @mentioned any maintainers
- [x] I have uploaded the build log and environment files
- [x] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate

This error is similar to an older (closed) build issue https://github.com/spack/spack/issues/8071
title: Installation issue: valgrind
